imdb.plot outline: These powerful women athletes live and co-exist together in one posh estate as their coach works them hard striving to make them the best. All the while attempting to maintain their very active social lives and professions. They risk it all, their relationships, their businesses and their social status's in order to win the season's coveted polo championship. It's drama unharnessed.
imdb.title: Polo Girls
plot: _Polo Girls_ (qv) follows the daily drama of six dynamic women (three in their 20's and three in their 30's) as these rivals try to be teammates while competing in this elite sport.::Libby Scripps

These powerful women athletes live and co-exist together in one posh estate as their coach works them hard striving to make them the best. All the while attempting to maintain their very active social lives and professions. They risk it all, their relationships, their businesses and their social status's in order to win the season's coveted polo championship. It's drama unharnessed.
